section.section:
The Secretary promptly shall:
Review each application and the information submitted under Part II of this subtitle; and
Investigate the proposed new hospital or related institution or proposed conversion, alteration, or addition.

Within 30 days after the application is submitted, the Secretary shall give the applicant:
Notice of approval or disapproval; and
In case of disapproval, each reason for the disapproval.

text.section: The Secretary shall grant approval under Part II of this subtitle if the hospital or related institution will meet the requirements of this subtitle.
